title: Resort Style Swimming Pool, Spacious Modern Living
posting_body: ['$300-$400 Security Deposit with Approved Credit', 'The Modern', '6301 W Hampden Ave , Denver, CO, 80227', 'Call Now -', 'show contact info', 'x 151', 'OR Text', '151', 'to', 'show contact info', 'to contact our leasing team.', 'Interested in more information?', 'Visit link below:', '<URL>', 'Welcome Home to The Modern', 'This is a 2 Bedroom, 2 Bath, approximately 1000 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'At the Modern, we provide an extraordinary level of privacy, security, and serenity.', 'Enjoy strolling around our lush Zen garden and pond, playing corn hole and grilling with friends at our newly built resident courtyard, taking a dip in our resort style pool or working out in our 24/7 fitness center.', 'Even your four-legged friends will enjoy living at the Modern with an expansive fenced-in dog park and direct access to Bear Creek which features walking trails and scenic views.', 'Along with outdoor recreation, residents can take advantage of our other community amenities including a recently remodeled clubhouse, community kitchen, modern business center with high-speed internet access, package-receiving services, and redesigned laundry facilities in every building.', 'Pet Policy', 'We love your pets and are excited to welcome them to their new home!', 'We allow two pets per apartment home with a combined weight not exceed 160 lbs.', 'Cats and dogs are welcome at our community although some breed restrictions apply.', 'Pet Deposit for 1 Pet: $100', 'Pet Fee for 1 Pet: $250', 'Monthly Pet Rent for 1 Pet: $35', 'Pet Deposit for 2 Pets: $200', 'Pet Fee for 2 Pets: $400', 'Monthly Pet Rent for 2 Pets: $65', 'Office Hours:', 'Monday-Friday:10:00AM-6:00PM', 'Saturday:10:00AM-5:00PM', '6mkf54pB0Zm']
